collection.name: Snake Plant, Spider Plant, Peace Lily, ZZ Plant

care.designTip: For a more bold statement garden, snake plant, spider plant, peace lilies, zz plants create a beautiful yet wild look for your space.

collection.name: Philodendron Brasil, Philodendron Micans, Boston Fern

care.designTip: For an understated and elegant touch to your house philodendron brasil, philodendron micans, and boston ferns create a serene yet elevated atmosphere for all to enjoy.

collection.name: Lucky Bamboo, Dwarf Bamboo, Boston Fern, Peace Lily, Anthurium

care.designTip: Bring a touch of the jungle to your living sapce that’ll surely wow your guests with lucky bamboo, dwarf bamboo, boston ferns, peace lilies, and anthuriums.

collection.name: Purple Shamrock, Haworthia, Peperomia Watermelon, Orchid

care.designTip: For a living space fit for a monarch purple shamrock, haworthia, peperomia watermelon, and orchids will bloom with vibrant royal purples that will be sure to catch any eye.
For a space with a pop of color, echeveria, aloe vera, and sedum will bring an array of striking cool toned hues to your day to day life.

collection.name: ZZ Plant, Peace Lilly, Snake Plant

care.designTip: For the more traditional gardener, zz plant, peace lilies, and snake plants bring cozy green hues indoors with a touch of fun through their unique leaves and blossoms.

collection.name: Philodendron Hope, Philodendron Micans, Money Tree, Fiddle Leaf Fig

care.designTip: A great set for indoor spaces, with a bit of maintance it will keep your indoor space looking earthy and lively.
For a more minimalistic approach, orchids, philodendron xanadu, and hoya plants create a nice pop of color that won’t overpower your living space.
For the maximalist with a green thumb, anthuriums, boston ferns, and dwarf bamboo are sure not to be outshined by a daring living space and will bring their own energy to your home.

collection.name: Aloe Vera, Echeveria, Jade Plant, Sedum

care.designTip: For the succulent loving home, aloe vera, echeveria, jade plants, and sedum bring lots of variety of color while still maintaining the manageable size of the succulent family.

collection.name: Mini Monstera, Money Tree, Heavenly Bamboo, Fiddle Leaf Fig, Philodendron Hope

care.designTip: For larger spaces with lots of personality, mini monstera, money trees, heavenly bamboo, and philodendron hope are great space fillers with subtle pops of color that’ll be sure to bring larger living spaces a more intimate feel.

collection.image: "plant_images/Mini Monstera.png", "plant_images/Money Tree.png", "plant_images/Heavenly Bamboo.png", "plant_images/Fiddle Leaf Fid.png", "plant_images/Philodendron Hope.png"

collection.name: Bird of Paradise, Rubber Plant, Monstera, Corn Plant, Dragon Tree

care.designTip: For the more bohemian style home, bird of paradise, rubber plants, monstera, corn plants, and dragons trees bring a wide variety of foliage to the home that is sure to make your space feel more serene.

collection.name: Jade Plant, Yucca Elephantipes, Hoya, Philodendron Xanadu

care.designTip: This unique garden set brings together the succulent charm of the Jade Plant, the bold stature of Yucca Elephantipes, the waxy cascading vines of Hoya, and the lush, textured leaves of Philodendron Xanadu for a captivating and diverse display of greenery.

collection.name: Black Bamboo, Golden Bamboo, Heavenly Bamboo

care.designTip: For a combines the sleek, dark tones of Black Bamboo, the vibrant golden hues of Golden Bamboo, and the delicate, feathery leaves of Heavenly Bamboo.
For a simple yet charming scene the lush, trailing vines of a pothos plant alongside the striking, upright form of a snake plant, creating a harmonious blend of greenery for any space.
